Website builder for residential complexes

The FrontEnd part of the project has been developed, which allows potential buyers of real estate to choose their future apartment. Choose a floor on the 3D plan of the house, consider possible layout options, sort proposals according to the specified parameters, add to favorites, download the plan in pdf format, contact the agent and many other tools available to the user.
The project is multifunctional for the customer and allows you to create similar applications for other LCD complexes yourself. It is possible to customize the site for a specific project, from colors to OpenGraph. Technologies: Vue Nuxt and the elements accompanying this ecosystem.
You can get acquainted with the site by following the link

Choosing an apartment on a 3D plan

A plan of a floor of a house with a display of available and unavailable offers

Apartment card
